name: House a lovecraft inspired game
description:
This is a Ludum Dare game the theme is the more you have the worse it is so thinking on that i made a game inspired by lovecraft and the more you know about the monster the worse it is

Buttons :

e - interact

esc - cancel

Story :

You are a scientist intrigued by this misterious house you aleays heard it had a ghost or something and now you are goin there to see it by yoursel, but now the door is locked and you need to get out.
